titleStmt.title: A prayer to be used on Wednesday November 13 In the office appointed for that day, immediately after the prayer for the High Court of Parliament (which is to be read during their session:) and next before the prayer of Saint Chrysostom, both in the morning, and evening service. By the Kings special command.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

titleStmt.title: A prayer to be used on Wednesday November 13 In the office appointed for that day, immediately after the prayer for the High Court of Parliament (which is to be read during their session:) and next before the prayer of Saint Chrysostom, both in the morning, and evening service. By the Kings special command.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

notesStmt.note: In this edition, the caption ends: "and evening service." In another edition, the caption ends: "during their session."
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
